auth/email-already-in-use: This email address has already been taken
an-error-occured-please-try-again-later: An error occured. Please try again later
auth/requires-recent-login: Changing the email or password requires a recent login. Click the re-authenticate button and try again.
auth/user-mismatch: Something went wrong with reauthenticating your account. Please sign out and try again

this-will-be-used-on-the-leaderboard: This will be used on the leaderboard.
something-went-wrong-please-close-the-ta: Something went wrong. Please close the tab and try again.
edit-the-information-below-then-hit-save: Edit the information below then hit save
enter-your-new-password-below-you-need-t: Enter your new password below. You need to be recently logged-in to change your password.
enter-your-password-below-to-re-authenti: Enter your password below to re-authenticate your account.
